features:
[b][i]BubbleClient Hub[/i][/b]
Install & Update BubbleClient with ease! [b]BubbleClient[/b] â€” A powerful client that uses FabricMC as its basis with preinstalled mods and configurations. Some mods are downloaded from free and open source resources, some are made specifically for this client!

[b][i]Why BubbleClient?[/i][/b]
[table=1]
[cell]Unlike other PvP Clients, this one isn't bloated with telemetry. All mods are BubbleFish's standarts.[/cell]
[cell]You can enable/disable certain mods. You always get support in discord.[/cell]
[cell]This client is perfectly optimized for clan PvP.[/cell]
[/table]

[b][i]Features[/i][/b]
[indent][b]Performance boosts[/b][/indent]
You are getting a smooth experience on both weak and powerful computers without sacrifice. You get more FPS, less memory usage, faster loading screens and more!

[indent][b]Friends, Chat & Cosmetics[/b][/indent]
More people use this client - more will be able to chat in game. Invite to servers and use cosmetics.

[indent][b]Player clans[/b][/indent]
You can set player clans that will make their in-game name colorful, which helps in war/big fights.

[indent][b]Replaymod[/b][/indent]
You can record servers to report cheaters, make videos, clips. You can appeal your bans. [b]Which you can use if you don't have a recording software[/b]

[indent][b]Better Ping display[/b][/indent]
Player pings won't display as lines, but as numbers now. You can always see your ping by looking at top left corner as well!

[indent][b]HUD[/b][/indent]
You can see your potion effects and when do they expire, very useful for playing wizard.

[indent][b]Player Name History Lookup[/b][/indent]
Don't remember that guy? Look his name up maybe it's your friend!

[indent][b]Health indicators[/b][/indent]
Some servers already have that. But, they display health as numbers, hearts are more intuitive, aren't they?

[indent][b]Look around[/b][/indent]
You can hold a key to look around yourself without moving your head. Useful when running away from someone, but, are you eternal to do so?

[indent][b]Emoji in chat[/b][/indent]
You can send emoji in chat. Instruction: [color=#3057EA][url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FWuPpHqQYkXnfRXXoAtagxrZlUyBaDvvLxpdS7o0ZKE/edit]How to use[/url][/color]. Those emoji will be seen by all players, not only those who use client!!

[indent][b]Zoom[/b][/indent]
You can zoom in and out by holding a key then using your mouse wheel. Very smooth and can zoom as far as you wish.

[indent][b]Toggled sprint[/b][/indent]
You don't have to hold Ctrl key all the time, just press it once and run forever!

[indent][b]Keybinds[/b][/indent]
You run away from 8 people and you wish to respawn? You can press a keybind to quickly do /kill or any other (only pussies abuse it though)

[indent][b]Popular mods[/b][/indent]
You can use sodium and lithium!

[indent][b]Other tweaks[/b][/indent]
* More chat history, no more chat lag.
* No more narrator.
* Screen won't shake when damage is taken, better aim!
* Screen tint to make you aware of low health.
* Copy screenshot to clipboard automatically.
* Chests, signs, etc. are 10+ (no kidding) times more optimized.
* Cull leaves (improve performance).
* Opening links won't freeze your game anymore.
mod_docs:
[b][i]InventoryHUD[/i][/b]
Adds [b]Potion Effects[/b], Armor and Inventory HUD. See instruction of how to manage this pack
- Instruction: [url=https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/inventory-hud-forge]https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/inventory-hud-forge[/url]

[b][i]Replaymod[/i][/b]
Adds recording of game, you can later watch Replays for any purposes.
- Instruction: [url=https://www.replaymod.com/docs/]https://www.replaymod.com/docs/[/url]

[b][i]Player Name History Lookup[/i][/b]
You can view player name history.
- Use [code]/names <Player Name>[/code] (or [code]/n <Player Name>[/code]) - look up the username history of the name supplied.
- Use [code]/namemc <Player Name>[/code] (or [code]/nm <Player Name>[/code]) - search the name on NameMC.

[b][i]Player Name Health Indicators[/i][/b]
You can toggle them on/off by setting a key in [code]Options > Keybinds[/code] (inside minecraft)

[b][i]Perspective[/i][/b]
You can rotate camera around by holding a key you setup in [code]Options > Keybinds[/code] (default: [code]...[/code])

[b][i]Zoom[/i][/b]
You can zoom by holding a key you setup in [code]Options > Keybinds[/code] (default: [code]c[/code])
While zooming you can use mouse wheel to zoom in and out

[b][i]Emoji[/i][/b]
You can send emoji in chat
- Instruction: [url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FWuPpHqQYkXnfRXXoAtagxrZlUyBaDvvLxpdS7o0ZKE/edit]Google Documents[/url]

[b][i]Essential[/i][/b]
You can add friends and chat with them.
- Instruction: [url=https://essential.gg/]https://essential.gg/[/url]

[b][i]You can rename players[/i][/b]
For this use [code]/clientnick set <Player> <New name>[/code]

[b][i]Boosted brightness[/i][/b]
You can set up to 1200% brightness in settings, so you can fight even in dark places!
about:
[center][b][i]About[/i][/b][/center]
This client is made by BubbleFish using Godot engine. Source code is available on [url=https://github.com/bubblefish-dev/bubbleclient-hub]Github[/url]. Made for LegionKnights PvP Clan <3 Blue

This client does not send any of your data anywhere, it is not made for illegal use on public servers!
